articles.title: Russia moves to seize hundreds of planes from foreign owners - CNN
articles.description: Russia is seizing hundreds of commercial jets owned by US and European leasing companies, a further sign of the challenges the country's airline industry faces due to sanctions following its invasion of Ukraine.
